name: created_at
description: Timestamp truncated to the nearest hour of the event creation.

name: traffic_source
description: The source of the traffic for the session.

name: postal_code
description: Postal code from where the session originated.

name: sessions
description: Count of distinct session IDs for the grouping.

name: purchase_events
description: Count of events where event_type equals 'purchase'.

name: total_events
description: Total count of events for the grouping.
